title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8138.18 - Town of Sand Lake
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8138.18 - Town of Sand Lake

State Regulations
(a) Route 351. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Route 351 from Route 43 to a point 0.8+-
mile north of Route 43 (RM 1000 to RM 1008), a distance of 0.8+-
mile. (b) Route 43. The eastbound
and westbound roadways of Route 43 from Route 351 westerly to the Sand Lake -
North Greenbush town line (RM 2063+- to RM 2080+-), a distance of 1.7+-
miles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8138.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
